column4: You can always re-install the package suplying that firmware files (find the right package with "dpkg -S /lib/firmware/foo").
does that restore the now gone /etc/firmware?
I'm afraid I won't be able to reboot now
There is no such file (/etc/firmware) on my machine, nor have I ever heard of such a file before. I doubt there was anything there previously to be overwritten.
